mapper.sql: t.id, t.manufacturer_name, t.class_code, t.sml_path, t.host_java_class, t.active_flag, t.icon_path, t.remarks, t.create_by, t.create_date, t.update_by, t.update_date, t.del_flag
mapper.select: select id, concat( manufacturer_name,'-',class_code) model_name from fab_equipment_model where del_flag = '0' and active_flag = 1
select manufacturer_name from fab_equipment_model where del_flag = '0'
select class_code from fab_equipment_model where del_flag = '0'
